1a:I[83908,["/_next/static/chunks/aafbbff64245ce70.js","/_next/static/chunks/617cf38e4c15e69e.js"],"ShareButtonWrapper"]
11:["$","p","11",{"className":"font-semibold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-200 my-6 text-xl","children":"\"天生我材必有用，千金散尽还复来\""}]
12:["$","p","12",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这是李白最为自信、最为豪迈的诗句。诗人相信自己天生就有才华，必定会有用武之地；即使散尽千金，也能够重新获得。这种乐观自信的人生态度，体现了盛唐气象和李白独特的个性魅力。"}]
13:["$","hr","13",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
14:["$","h2","14",{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"创作背景"}]
15:["$","p","15",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"《将进酒》是李白长安放还以后所作。诗人豪饮高歌，借酒消愁，抒发了忧愤深广的人生感慨。诗中交织着失望与自信、悲愤与抗争的情怀，体现出诗人强烈的豪纵狂放的个性。"}]
16:["$","hr","16",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
